metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28331 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: On Windows, Apache Portable Runtime 1.7.0 and earlier may write beyond the end of a stack based buffer in apr_socket_sendv(). This is a result of integer overflow.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Only affects apr on Windows so Ubuntu is not affected.

criterions.comment: apr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
